overview: When 6-year-old Elizabeth (Lucia Malagon) cuts off one of her pigtails while at school, her strong-willed and super protective mother (Camila Arteche) rushes Elizabeth to the beauty parlor, where she is the center of attention for all the wrong reasons. A first-generation Cuban American in Miami, Elizabeth seeks to find her own identity with the help of a new friend.
title: Un Pequeño Corte
